root.name: Feeding Frenzy
root.description: Feeding Frenzy is the first game in the Feeding Frenzy series created by PopCap. The player controls different fish (and an orca whale), who start every level being able to eat only the smallest fish in their 2D slice of ocean. By eating more and more fish, the player's fish gets bigger and is able to eat bigger fish until the last of the 40 levels, Orville the Orca eats the huge Shark King.
